"Sunglasses are the perfect accessory to hide your struggles, just like how is to hide your true feelings."
"I guess it's true what they say, sunglasses are always a good hiding."
"Sunglasses are the perfect disguise for those who are struggling with their weaknesses."
"I'm not surprised you're struggling, sunglasses are the ultimate cover-up for those who don't want to face their weaknesses."
"Sunglasses are the perfect solution for those who are struggling with their weaknesses, just like how I'm struggling to come up with creative ideas."
